Un gioco tutto sommato carino, pieno di bug, crash vari e una community un pochino tossica, ma ha anche dei difetti. Molto divertente se giocato in compagnia. Una volta raggiunta una certa esperienza di gioco il rank giocatore diventa superfluo e anzi si tenderà a derankare, proprio per evitare di incontrare avversari tryhardoni e/o tossici.
温馨提示，鼠标右键不好的人千万不要玩这个游戏！游戏体验挺差的！夹哥安装不了夹子，小叮当隐身了就不能现身了，兔妈的斧子也扔不出去，游戏是好游戏这只能怪自己的配置不行（捂脸笑哭）还有还有希望能优化一下匹配机制，感觉这游戏对新手不是特别友好，我一个16阶的小屠夫萌新你给我来个10阶人皇是什么意思（捂脸），还有非常喜欢这游戏的的代入感和恐惧感，希望这游戏会越来越好吧(σﾟ∀ﾟ)σ..:*

It's a affordable game that provides a fun a unique experience for fans of the horror genre and multiplayer. The game provides a reasonable amount of resources, tutorials, and advice to learn and grow as a player. The core and only game mode is rather simple but done well for such a reasonable price; the developers keep the game fresh and exciting by a decent size of map selection with randomly generated game objectives, original/classic horror dlc characters with different abilities and perks. If you've seen gameplay and don't think you'll enjoy the game, you might not because theres nothing much beside that.
game good. play lot. think about match. regret.
